id.description: The unique identifier of the location.

name.description: The name of the telephony location.

id.description: The ID of the contact user.

selfUri.description: The URI to access the contact user details.

emergencyNumber.description: Information about the emergency contact number.

country.description: The country code of the address.

state.description: The state or region of the address.

street1.description: The first line of the street address.

street2.description: The second line of the street address.

zipcode.description: The postal code of the address.

state.description: The current state of the location.

notes.description: Any additional notes or comments related to the location.

version.description: The version of the telephony location data.

resolution.description: The resolution of the profile image.

imageUri.description: The URI to access the profile image.

resolution.description: The resolution of the floorplan image.

imageUri.description: The URI to access the floorplan image.

addressVerificationDetails.description: Details about the verification of the address.

status.description: The status of address verification process.

dateFinished.description: The date and time when address verification was completed.

dateStarted.description: The date and time when address verification was started.

service.description: The service used for address verification.

addressVerified.description: Indicates whether the address is verified or not.

addressStored.description: Indicates whether the address is stored or not.

images.description: Additional images related to the location.

selfUri.description: The URI to access the telephony location details.
